subject: Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
lead_paragraph: Phoenix forward Raffi Torres was suspended for a late hit in Game 3 that resulted in Chicago’s Marian Hossa being taken off the ice on a stretcher.
snippet: Phoenix forward Raffi Torres was suspended for a late hit in Game 3 that resulted in Chicago’s Marian Hossa being taken off the ice on a stretcher.
